videos.description: Russell Wilson threw for 345 yards and five touchdowns, while Markus Wheaton caught nine balls for 201 yards in the Seahawks' thrilling 39-30 victory over the Steelers.
videos.headline: Seahawks' Russell Wilson, Steelers' Markus Wheaton get game balls
